extension.description: Online Video Portal des FC Schalke 04. Alle Spiele des S04 in re-Live (15 Minuten nach Abfiff), Interviews, exklusive Berichte und Specials rund um FC Schalke 04. Setzt einen S04tv Benutzer Account voraus. Mehr Details auf https://www.s04tv.de.

Online video portal from FC Schalke 04 - German Football team. Watch all videos from S04tv including all S04 matches in re-Live (15 minutes after the match has ended). Requires S04tv user account. See https://www.s04tv.de for more details.
